subject: Football
Murders and Attempted Murders
Suicides and Suicide Attempts
lead_paragraph: In the wake of Jovan Belcher’s crime and death, the Chiefs will probably turn for help to the people they know and trust: the doctors, trainers and chaplains who are regularly around the team.
snippet: In the wake of Jovan Belcher’s crime and death, the Chiefs will probably turn for help to the people they know and trust: the doctors, trainers and chaplains who are regularly around the team.
